name: ListPullRequests
description:
Retrieve pull requests from a GitHub repository.

This tool retrieves a list of pull requests from a specified GitHub repository, including both open and draft requests, for users with appropriate GitHub plans.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository from which to retrieve pull requests. This name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: filter_by_state
parameters.description: Filter pull requests by state: `open`, `closed`, or `all`.

value_schema.description: Either `open`, `closed`, or `all` to filter by state.

parameters.name: filter_by_head
parameters.description: Filter pull requests by head user/organization and branch in `user:ref-name` format.

value_schema.description: Filter pulls by head user or head organization and branch name in the format of `user:ref-name` or `organization:ref-name`. For example: `github:new-script-format` or `octocat:test-branch`.

parameters.name: base_branch_name
parameters.description: Specify the base branch name to filter pull requests. Example: 'gh-pages'.

value_schema.description: Filter pulls by base branch name. Example: `gh-pages`.

parameters.name: sort_pull_request_results_by
parameters.description: Specify the criterion for sorting pull request results. Options are 'created', 'updated', 'popularity', or 'long-running'.

value_schema.description: What to sort results by. `popularity` will sort by the number of comments. `long-running` will sort by date created and will limit the results to pull requests that have been open for more than a month and have had activity within the past month.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: The direction of the sorting for pull requests. Use 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending order. Defaults to 'desc' when 'sort' is 'created' or not specified.

value_schema.description: The direction of the sort. Default: `desc` when sort is `created` or sort is not specified, otherwise `asc`.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of pull requests to retrieve per page, with a maximum of 100 results allowed.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch from the list of pull requests.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

value_schema.description: The direction of the sort. Default: `desc` when sort is `created` or sort is not specified, otherwise `asc`.
